Sentencas: Electrochemistry, a branch of chemistry involving chemical reactions that produce electrical currents, has found vast applications in modern industries such as batteries, fuel cells and electroplating.
Titulo: A thermo-electro-chemo-mechanically coupling theory considering species diffusion and electrochemical reaction

Sentencas: To analyze frequently encountered thermo-electro-chemo-mechanical problems in electrochemically active materials with two different conductive phases, ionic conductor or electronic conductor, we develop a novel Helmholtz-energy -based framework taking coupled mechanical deformation, mass diffusion, heat conduction, charge flow and electrochemical reaction into account.
Titulo: A thermo-electro-chemo-mechanically coupling theory considering species diffusion and electrochemical reaction

Sentencas: Different from other existing multiphysics coupled models, the electro-chemical reaction kinetics among different phases can be explicitly expressed in this work as a function of those distinct electric potentials in different conductive phases.
Titulo: A thermo-electro-chemo-mechanically coupling theory considering species diffusion and electrochemical reaction

Sentencas: This framework can be reduced in some special cases to cover the well-known phenomena such as Soret-Dufour effect and Peltier-Seebeck effect.
Titulo: A thermo-electro-chemo-mechanically coupling theory considering species diffusion and electrochemical reaction

Sentencas: Taking advantage of this new description, a numerical model of button solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) with thermo-electro-chemo-mechanically coupled effects is established in COMSOL by introducing a well constructive Helmholtz free en-ergy.
Titulo: A thermo-electro-chemo-mechanically coupling theory considering species diffusion and electrochemical reaction

Sentencas: Thus, the distribution of multi-physics fields in SOFC can be numerically studied and compared with some experimental results, which shows a good agreement.
Titulo: A thermo-electro-chemo-mechanically coupling theory considering species diffusion and electrochemical reaction

Sentencas: The numerical results also reveal that the chemical deformation is crucial for SOFC as it can change the stress state.
Titulo: A thermo-electro-chemo-mechanically coupling theory considering species diffusion and electrochemical reaction

Sentencas: To calculate the stress in SOFC accurately, it is necessary to take the chemical stress into consideration.
Titulo: A thermo-electro-chemo-mechanically coupling theory considering species diffusion and electrochemical reaction

Sentencas: In addition, this work provides a new sparkling ideal to reduce the stress for the design of future SOFC.
Titulo: A thermo-electro-chemo-mechanically coupling theory considering species diffusion and electrochemical reaction
